workflow.name: Automate AI video creation & multi-platform publishing with GPT-4, Veo 3.1 & Blotato
workflow.description:
# üí• Automate AI Video Creation & Multi-Platform Publishing with Veo 3.1 & Blotato

![Workflow Overview](https://www.dr-firas.com/veo31.png)

### üéØ Who is this for?
This workflow is designed for **content creators, marketers, and automation enthusiasts** who want to produce professional AI-generated videos and publish them automatically on social media ‚Äî without editing or manual uploads. Perfect for those using **Veo 3.1**, **GPT-4**, and **Blotato** to scale video creation.

---

### üí° What problem is this workflow solving?
Creating short-form content (TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts) is time-consuming ‚Äî from writing scripts to video editing and posting.  
This workflow eliminates the manual steps by combining **AI storytelling + video generation + automated publishing**, letting you focus on creativity while your system handles production and distribution.

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è What this workflow does
1. **Reads new ideas from Google Sheets**  
2. **Generates story scripts** using GPT-4  
3. **Creates cinematic videos** using Veo 3.1 (`fal.ai/veo3.1/reference-to-video`) with 3 input reference images  
4. **Uploads the final video** automatically to Google Drive  
5. **Publishes the video** across multiple platforms (TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, X, LinkedIn, YouTube) via **Blotato**  
6. **Updates Google Sheets** with video URL and status (Completed / Failed)

---

### üß© Setup
**Required accounts:**
- [OpenAI](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) ‚Üí GPT-4 API key  
- [fal.ai](https://fal.ai/dashboard/keys) ‚Üí Veo 3.1 API key  
- [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com) ‚Üí Sheets & Drive connection  
- [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) ‚Üí API key for social media publishing  

**Configuration steps:**
1. Copy the **Google Sheets structure**:  
   - A: `id_video`  
   - B: `niche`  
   - C: `idea`  
   - D: `url_1`  
   - E: `url_2`  
   - F: `url_3`  
   - G: `url_final`  
   - H: `status`  

2. Add your API keys to the **Workflow Configuration** node.  
3. Insert three image URLs and a short idea into your sheet.  
4. Wait for the automation to process and generate your video.  

---

### üß† How to customize this workflow
- **Change duration or aspect ratio** ‚Üí Edit the Veo 3.1 node JSON body (`duration`, `aspect_ratio`)  
- **Modify prompt style** ‚Üí Adjust the ‚ÄúOptimize Prompt for Veo‚Äù node for your desired tone or cinematic look  
- **Add more platforms** ‚Üí Extend Blotato integration to publish on Pinterest, Reddit, or Threads  
- **Enable Telegram Trigger** ‚Üí Allow users to submit ideas and images directly via Telegram  

---

### üöÄ Expected Outcome
Within **2‚Äì3 minutes**, your idea is transformed into a full cinematic AI video ‚Äî complete with storytelling, visuals, and automatic posting to your social media channels.  

Save hours of editing and focus on strategy, creativity, and growth.

---

### üëã Need help or want to customize this?
üì© Contact: [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/)  
üì∫ YouTube: [@DRFIRASS](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)  
üöÄ Workshops: [Mes Ateliers n8n](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

---
üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Automate-AI-Video-Creation-Multi-Platform-Publishing-with-Veo-3-1-Blotato-29c3d6550fd981cd982fd4a031bdfe07?source=copy_link)
### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCriIQI8uaoEro5FEnOpeidQ) / [üöÄ Mes Ateliers n8n  ](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

workflow.name: üí• Automate AI Video Creation & Multi-Platform Publishing with Veo 3.1 & Blotato - vide

assignments.name: veo_prompt
assignments.value: ={{ $json.prompt }} consistent character throughout, photorealistic quality, professional cinematography, 8 seconds duration, 9:16 aspect ratio, 24fps

values.content: You are a viral video content creator

=Create viral video content for {{ $json.niche }} about {{ $json.idea }}. Return JSON with: prompt (150-200 word cinematic Veo 3.1 description), caption (50-100 word social media text with emojis), hashtags (array of 8-10 tags)

parameters.content:
# üì§ STEP 5: PUBLISHING & TRACKING

### Install the Blotato [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) Node in n8n (Community Nodes)
1. In n8n, open **Settings ‚Üí Community Nodes**.  
2. Click **Install**, then add: `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`.  
3. Log in to **Blotato**.  
4. Go to **Settings ‚Üí API Keys**.  
5. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New**.  
6. Choose **Blotato API** 
(provided by the community node you installed).  

‚úÖ **Activate Workflow:**
- Toggle workflow to **Active** state
- Ensure trigger is enabled

‚úÖ **Monitor Executions:**
- Check execution history regularly
- Review error logs if failures occur

# üé¨ AI VIDEO GENERATOR - VEO 3.1

**Workflow Steps:**
1. Monitor Google Sheets for new video requests
2. Generate content with GPT-4
3. Create video with Veo 3.1
4. Upload to Google Drive
5. Publish to social media via Blotato
# üìã STEP 1: PREREQUISITES

1. **OpenAI (GPT-4)**
   - Sign up: [platform.openai.com](https://platform.openai.com)
   - Get API key: [platform.openai.com/api-keys](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)
   - Estimated cost: ~$0.01-0.05 per video

2. **fal.ai (Veo 3.1)**
   - Sign up: [fal.ai](https://fal.ai)
   - Get API key: [fal.ai/dashboard/keys](https://fal.ai/dashboard/keys)
   - Estimated cost: ~$0.50-2.00 per video

3. **Google Account**
   - Google Sheets (trigger & tracking)
   - Google Drive (video storage)
   - Free tier available

4. **Blotato (Social Media Publishing)**
   - Sign up: [blotato.com](https://blotato.com)
   - Get API key from Settings ‚Üí API Keys
   - Multi-platform publishing support

# üìä STEP 2: GOOGLE SHEETS

### Create Video_Requests Sheet
1. Create a new Google Sheet named **Video_Requests**
2. Add the following columns (A through H):
   - **A: id_video** - Unique video ID (auto-generated or sequential)
   - **B: niche** - Content niche or category (e.g. Tech, Fashion, Fitness)
   - **C: idea** - Short video idea or concept (min 5 characters)
   - **D: url_1** - First reference image (scene, product, or creator)
   - **E: url_2** - Second reference image
   - **F: url_3** - Third reference image
   - **G: url_final** - Final generated video URL (auto-filled by n8n)
   - **H: status** - Processing status (pending / processing / completed / failed)


### Image URL Requirements
- All image URLs must start with `http://` or `https://`
- Google Drive URLs will be automatically converted to direct download links
- Minimum 3 images required per video request

### Google Drive Setup
1. Create a folder in Google Drive for video storage
2. Copy the folder ID from the URL
3. Update the `google_drive_folder_id` in Workflow Configuration node

# üîë STEP 3: API KEYS CONFIGURATION


## ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Warnings

**Timeout:** Veo video generation can take 5-10 minutes. HTTP request timeout is set to 10 minutes (600,000ms).

**Estimated Costs Per Video:**
- GPT-4 API call: ~$0.01-0.05
- Fal.ai Veo 3.1 generation: ~$0.50-1.00
- Total per video: ~$0.51-1.05

**Rate Limits:** Be mindful of API rate limits for all services.

# üöÄ STEP 4: WORKFLOW ACTIVATION

## Pre-Activation Checklist

‚úÖ **Verify All Credentials:**
- OpenAI API key configured
- Fal.ai API key set
- Google Sheets OAuth connected
- Google Drive OAuth connected
- Blotato API key added (if publishing)

‚úÖ **Test Workflow:**
1. Add a test row in your Google Sheets:
   - id_video: TEST_001
   - niche: Health
   - idea: Benefits of morning exercise
   - url_1, url_2, url_3: Valid image URLs
   - status: pending
2. Wait for trigger to fire (30 min polling)
3. Monitor execution in n8n dashboard

user.name: Dr. Firas
user.bio: Automation expert and certified trainer. I create hands-on courses to master automation with n8n. Contact me to access my exclusive training and start building powerful workflows today. üöÄ
